actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to disallow deductions for attending conventions outside the United States and Canada.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to disallow deductions from gross income for the expenses of attending conventions outside the United States and Canada, unless after taking into account criteria set forth in this Act it is more reasonable for the meeting to be held outside such country.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to disallow deductions for attending conventions outside the United States and Canada.
